title: The Story of a Small Fox Who Has a Star - Novel Updates

tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Ancient Times   Animal Characteristics   Average-looking Protagonist   Beasts   Bullying   Child Abuse   Confinement   Cute Protagonist   Death   Dense Protagonist   Discrimination   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Flashbacks   Mythical Beasts   Suicides   Weak Protagonist   Wealthy Characters

description: Master Cheon-Ho birthed two foxes out of boredom. One was beautiful and strong while the other was plain and weak. The story follows a fox who was born plain and weak.>
